directions: Mix oil, melted chocolate, and sugar in a large mixing bowl.  Blend in egg substitute or egg whites a little bit at a time.  Blend in vanilla.  Stir in salt, baking powder, and flour into oil mixture.

Drop teaspoonfuls of dough into confectioners' sugar.  Roll in sugar, then shape into balls.  Place 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet.  Flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in the confectioners' sugar.   Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).  Do not overbake.
title: Chocolate Doodles
